price: Hindi nakapagdulot para sa kanya ang yaman niya at ang anumang nakamit niya.
arabic: مَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُ مَالُهُۥ وَمَا كَسَبَ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: mā aghnā ʿanhu māluhu wamā kasaba
